opis: On the island of Čiovo, which is next to the city of Split, a modern newly bulit house is for sale. It is located in the part of island Čiovo called Okrug Gornji. The house is 200 meters from sea. It was built 2012., and completely renovated in 2024/2025. A new facade, plumbing and wires are installed. It has new ceramic tiles around the house. New waterproffing is around the house and on the balconies. Inside the house the floors have a new ceramic tiles from Italy. The house has new PVC windows, roof and roof drainage. Net usable area is 234 m2. Plot around the house is 366m2. There is a swimming pool 8m x 4,5m, jacuzzi, playground for children 50m2 and a big stone grill. In the ground floor there is a depository in which is the equipment for the pool, sunbeds, extra furniture, additional ceramics etc. On the first floor there is a living room with a kitchen, two bedrooms, bathroom and a terrace. On the second floor there are three bedrooms each one with a bathroom and a balcony. One room has two balconies. Every room has a smart TV and air condition. There is a laundry room with a washing machine. There are 3 parking spots with a possibility of a garage. The house has six cameras set up for security with a 24 live feed on your cellphone. It is completely prepared for living. It has all the furniture and equipment and it is in the asking price. Na otoku Čiovu, koji se nalazi pored grada Splita, prodaje se moderna novoizgrađena kuća. Nalazi se u dijelu otoka Čiova koji se zove Okrug Gornji. Kuća je udaljena 200 metara od mora. Izgrađena je 2012. godine, a potpuno renovirana 2024./2025. godine. Postavljena je nova fasada, vodovod i električne instalacije. Ima nove keramičke pločice oko kuće. Nova hidroizolacija je oko kuće i na balkonima. Unutar kuće podovi su prekriveni keramičkim pločicama iz Italije. Kuća ima nove PVC prozore, krov i krovnu odvodnju. Neto korisna površina je 234 m2. Parcela oko kuće je 366 m2. Tu je bazen 8m x 4,5m, jacuzzi, igralište za djecu 50m2 i veliki kameni roštilj. U prizemlju se nalazi spremište u kojem se nalazi oprema za bazen, ležaljke, dodatni namještaj, dodatna keramika itd. Na prvom katu nalazi se dnevni boravak s kuhinjom, dvije spavaće sobe, kupaonica i terasa. Na drugom katu nalaze se tri spavaće sobe, svaka s kupaonicom i balkonom. Jedna soba ima dva balkona. Svaka soba ima smart TV i klima uređaj. Tu je i praonica s perilicom rublja. Postoje 3 parkirna mjesta s mogućnošću garaže. Kuća ima šest kamera za sigurnost s 24-satnim prijenosom uživo na vaš mobitel. Kuća je potpuno spremna za život. Ima sav namještaj i opremu i sve je uključeno u traženoj cijeni.
